ticket.title: application template does not understand https urls.
ticket.original-body: @@@ Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ rails core -m https://github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb create create README ... create vendor/plugins/.gitkeep The template [/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb] could not be loaded. Error: Could not find "/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb" in source paths. Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ @@@
ticket.latest-body: @@@ Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ rails core -m https://github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb create create README ... create vendor/plugins/.gitkeep The template [/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb] could not be loaded. Error: Could not find "/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb" in source paths. Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ @@@
ticket.original-body-html:
Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ rails core -m https://github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb
      create  
      create  README
      ...
      create  vendor/plugins/.gitkeep
The template [/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb] could not be loaded. Error: Could not find "/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb" in source paths.
Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $

Error: Could not find "/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb" in source paths. Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ @@@

Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $ rails core -m https://github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb
      create  
      create  README
      ...
      create  vendor/plugins/.gitkeep
The template [/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb] could not be loaded. Error: Could not find "/Users/phil/Public/code/https:/github.com/some/private/raw/master/template.rb" in source paths.
Wheelie-Cyberman:~/code $
version.title: application template does not understand https urls.

version.body:
This was actually a Thor-related issue, fixed in this commit:
http://github.com/wycats/thor/commit/e62bc72f3e15ea6871887977acf2c168ec54adfb
This can be closed.
version.body-html:
This was actually a Thor-related issue, fixed in this commit:

http://github.com/wycats/thor/commit/e62bc72f3e15ea6871887977acf2c1...

This can be closed.
version.title: application template does not understand https urls.
application template does not understand https urls.

version.body: There is also an issue in rails itself preventing https templates from working. There's a fix waiting here: https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/5926-bug-patch-allow-https-uris-to-be-supplied-for-rails-templates
version.body-html: There is also an issue in rails itself preventing https templates from working. There's a fix waiting here: https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/5926-bug-patc...
version.title: application template does not understand https urls.
